item.description: This is not a group event per se, but I listed it here anyhow for those who didn't know about it - what he does clearly falls under the term 'paranormal.' John Edward's Boston events (referred to at our last meeting) are already sold out. This Portland show is one of two scheduled there, but seating for the afternoon (same date, 2:00pm) is not available online (small number of seats remaining). For more info, goto www.johnedward.net, or www.porttix.com. Event fee
item.name: local John Edward events
